alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 9:35AM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Bighorn Canyon, Northern Big Horn, Southern Big Horn, and Treasure. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday evening and Tuesday commutes.
info.instruction: Persons should consider delaying travel if possible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn; Treasure
